message: Bob, I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair considering the inflation rate. What do you think?
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be realistic, I'm proposing a 70/30 split. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking.
Bob, your offer was unrealistic. I'm willing to compromise, but a 55/45 split in your favor is the best I can do considering the time pressure.
